events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer role and will begin review shortly.
The application has been categorised under Engineering, specifically for the software developer position.
A recruiter has been assigned to follow up with the candidate and coordinate the next steps in this software engineering recruitment process.
The candidate completed the initial screening call, demonstrating solid expertise and a good fit for the software developer role.
Candidate responded positively to the initial screening and expressed strong enthusiasm for progressing to the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for May 7th to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing strong software development knowledge and problem-solving ability.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and benefits, continuing the recruitment process for this engineering candidate.
